data.description: Great Berkley Bungalow! Coved Ceilings, Some Hdwd Floors And Large Master Suite Upstairs With Walk-in Closet. Enjoy The Covered Front Porch And The Fenced In Backyard. Buyer And/or Buyer's Agent To Verify All Info. Buyer Must Be Pre-approved With John Adams Mortgage Company. Short Sale Subject To Third Party Approval. 10/01/10
